title: Yo check out this new game I found
body:
http://i.imgur.com/7aUqZch.png

It definitely isn't using stolen artwork or anything.

And the best part: It's the login gif as well. Light, fire and water in a loop.

I don't care for MLP personally but It's support I'm really interested in giving.
idk, riot doesn't even care
What can they say? Rito Games has the best artist. Its Flattering to them rly
Yeah you should feel honored when a burglar decides to rob your house over your neighbor's.

riot cant really do anything anymore
it being owned by tencent a chinese mining company the copyright over their for graphic design is pretty much non existant in the video game world, maybe if riot decided to make an anime or a manga they might be able to hold some legal ground.

does that count?

no sadly cause it falls under fair use for youtube and it still is primarily a chinese company any artwork can be stolen, and I mean look at music videos or past skins they ripped off sailor moon with the star gaurdian line and they also ripped off bowser with the one rammus skin.

That was fast.
I've played this game before in China. There's people with the EXACT same abilities as garen, ashe, ryze, teemo,yasuo, and a few others.

...Those...
...Fiends...

... I have no words to describe how sad this is.
